meanings.definition: A person who climbs or uses escalators.
meanings.sent1: The escaladers quickly ascended the escalator.
meanings.sent2: The busy mall was filled with escaladers going up and down.
meanings.sent3: The escaladers had a race to see who could reach the top first.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of commuters, the escaladers stood out like determined ants.
meanings.sent5: The escaladers were like a human chain, moving steadily along the escalator.

meanings.definition: A group of people who climb or use escalators.
meanings.sent1: A large group of escaladers gathered at the bottom of the escalator.
meanings.sent2: The tour guide led the escaladers to the next floor.
meanings.sent3: The escaladers formed a conga line on the escalator, much to the amusement of other shoppers.
meanings.sent4: The escaladers moved together like a synchronized dance troupe.
meanings.sent5: The escaladers resembled a line of ants marching up the escalator.
